name: Time Out (Jax1808)
description:
A Shoot Em Up game that requires more responsive reaction from players. Players will need to match their car with the opponent before shooting to avoid receiving damage themselves. Different colored enemy cars will have different skills and attacks. Not only that, there will be a countdown timer that could only be maintained by constantly destroying as many enemies as possible. This makes it impossible for players to go through the game by just dodging all the time. Hope you enjoy the game, have fun!!!

(Use the mouse to click on the options)
